After a LOT of tapas it was great to find a delicious Mexican place in the neighborhood. They have a variety of interesting margaritas on the menu. I tried the passion fruit and their standard house margarita and both were great. I stuck with simple carnitas tacos and they were very flavorful and the perfect portion size. We also shared the guacamole which was extremely fresh and a nice balance of chunky and creamy. I will definitely be back.
